constituent: shoulder, door, one, ceiling, flag, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
koohiiStory1: The shoulder is the best part of the body to bash a door open with (Don´t ever try this. Use your foot).
koohiiStory2: The shoulder is part of the body you use to push through the noren in a doorway. I was having trouble with positioning of the primitives until I tweaked shaydwyrm´s story slightly. If you think of pushing through a noren, this makes sense as a pictograph. The noren hangs from above, and you push through it from below.
